data.title: Good Move — Glasgow Life
data.text:
Come along and enjoy the fresh air, meet new people and take in the sights of Glasgow's parks and gardens. ​​​

Lasting around an hour, Health Walks are easy, sociable and most of all good fun. Walk Leaders are on hand to encourage you to go at a pace you’re comfortable with and make sure you get the most out of your walk. All abilities are welcome, please bring a buddy if you need one to one support.

Search our Activity Finder to find your nearest Health Walk, or click on the options below then scroll down to find a Walk in your area:

North Glasgow

South Glasgow

East Glasgow

West Glasgow

Please get in touch with the contact person for a walk before attending to check it is going ahead as scheduled and there is space to welcome new walkers. Or, contact the Good Move Walking team and we can advise on the best option available – call 0141 287 0963 or email walking@glasgowlife.org.uk

Join us on one of our free, 2-hour Themed Walks to discover more about the city’s culture, art, architecture, wildlife and history. Please note that booking is essential. Watch our feature video here.

Click here to see details of the current programme then scroll down.

For more info and to book please email walking@glasgowlife.org.uk or call 0141 287 0963, leave a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

At Live Active, we’ll help you build the confidence you need to make positive lifestyle changes. We’ll personalise our support to make sure it meets your needs. With our one-to-one catch-ups and supported activity sessions we’ll make sure you get the package that’s right for you.

Our Live Active Advisors are with you every step of the way helping you stay on track and achieve your goals - leaving you feeling great and getting the most out of life.​

Our advisors can support you in person, over the phone or by video call – it’s your choice! To get started, your GP or other registered health professional needs to refer you. You can usually get in touch with your GP practice over the phone and ask them to make a referral to Live Active for you without the need for an appointment.

Cost: Free

Fee may apply for supported activity.

Our fun and friendly Vitality classes have been specially designed for people living with a range of medical conditions. They are also suitable if someone has a fear of falling or find that strength and balance is impacting on daily life. Our welcoming and supportive instructors will give you the confidence to join in, get active and lead a fuller, more independent life.

We’ll help you choose a level of activity that best suits your needs, making sure you are safe, comfortable and above all else having fun.

Find out more about Vitality by emailing us about classes in your area.

Not sure what is right for you? We can help guide you to a level of class that’s suitable for you. Call us for more information on 0141 2879882
